attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that the Government want to be able to have records of all phone calls and emails made and also wish to put ALL children on a database is against our human rights. 

We need to make a stand against this and protect our privacy as we have a RIGHT to do so. 

If we don't stop it now, the lives of our future generations will be riddled with paranoia, distrust and a complete lack of privacy.

The Government should be focusing on more relevant issues to our current climate instead of spending billions to turn our country into a set of Big Brother.
